configurableConfig.description: Pick "Custom..." in the popup selection to use a particular browser edition or read from a variable.
configurableConfig.label: Custom

configurableConfig.description: Text can be present anywhere in the URL, as long as it's contiguous.
configurableConfig.label: Match For

script:
readonly run_script='../../../../com.alfredapp.automation.core/safari/safari.tabs.not-matching/run'

if [[ "${popup_browser}" == 'custom' ]]; then
  browser="${custom_browser}"
else
  browser="${popup_browser}"
fi

"${run_script}" "${browser}" "${out_format}" "${match_string}"
taskDescription: Returns all Webkit browser tabs not containing specified text in URL
taskName: Get Webkit Browser Tabs Not Matching URL
